bug.author: apc999
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: v2.0.0 Describe the bug For FS operations implemented by the master-side API setAttribute, including pin, setTtl, chmod, chown, chgrp, setReplication, loadMetadataInterval on server side will always be 0 due to the missing commonOptions in SetAttributeOptions. This results always unnecessary, possibly too much UFS load metadata operations even the file metadata has been cached already. To Reproduce mount a local fs containing file foo then fs pin this file which will succeed. versus in 1.8 one needs fs ls first before being able to fs pin Expected behavior Two possible options:
convert back to behavior of 1.8 that makes default synInterval -1 instead of 0 (due to protobuf) introduce a new behavior that it will sync on-demand for the first time, and follows sync interval in the future
Urgency High Additional context
